titles.title: Thy Loving Kindness Is Better Than Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thy loving kindness is better than life.
Thy loving kindness is better than life.
My lips shall praise Thee, thus will I bless Thee.
I will lift up my hands in Thy Name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mejor que vida es Tu misericordia (2x)
Oh Dios Te alabo y Te bendigo, yo quiero alzar mis manos ante Ti.
